item.title: VoX
item.description: Race! Race! Race! VoX is a unique VR arcade game where youâ€™ll try to out best yourself and your friends. Collect coins, drift and stay on track! /* Basic styling for readability */ table { width: 90%; margin: 20px auto; border-collapse: collapse; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } th, td { padding: 12px 15px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #ddd; } th { background-color: #add8e6; /* Light blue color */ font-weight: bold; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f9f9f9; } .
